title: Inverness XR Community Meetup
description: Monthly gathering for XR makers, studios, and educators in Inverness.
longDescription: An open evening of project demos and community updates at Wasps Creative Academy, with space for headset tests and peer feedback.

title: Fort William Immersive Story Jam
description: One-day workshop on narrative design for AR and VR prototypes.
longDescription: Writers, designers, and developers prototype short immersive stories rooted in Highland landscapes and pitch outcomes by the end of the day.

title: Ullapool Heritage XR Demo Day
description: Public demo day for immersive heritage storytelling concepts.
longDescription: A showcase format where museum and creative teams test interpretation ideas with local audiences and gather feedback for future pilots.

title: Laser Go VR
description: Inverness venue offering free-roam multiplayer virtual reality sessions.
longDescription: Laser Go VR operates in Inverness with free-roam gameplay formats and session booking options for social groups.

title: Inverness Virtual Reality Experiences
description: City-based VR attraction with public sessions and private bookings.
longDescription: Inverness Virtual Reality Experiences provides location-based VR sessions in the city with options for events and group bookings.

title: iv360 (Immersive Vision 360)
description: Inverness team delivering 360 capture, digital twins, and AR/VR services.
longDescription: iv360 provides 360 imaging, drone survey work, digital twins, and immersive media production from Inverness Campus.

title: Accord Business Solutions
description: Technology partner providing managed IT, cloud, and digital transformation support.
longDescription: Accord Business Solutions supports Highland organisations with managed services, cloud systems, and digital tooling from its Inverness Campus base.

title: Inverness Museum & Art Gallery AR
description: Museum AR heritage interpretation project led by High Life Highland.
longDescription: The museum team has documented AR interpretation work connected to Jacobite artefacts and collaborative research partnerships.

title: West Highland Museum VR
description: Fort William museum with a VR reconstruction of 1773 Fort William.
longDescription: A museum-led immersive interpretation project allowing visitors to explore an historical reconstruction of the fort environment.

title: XpoNorth Digital
description: Regional programme supporting creative digital and XR capability.
longDescription: XpoNorth Digital publishes practical XR resources and supports project development for creatives across the Highlands and Islands.

title: Inverness Castle Experience
description: Immersive visitor attraction centred on Highland stories and culture.
longDescription: The Inverness Castle Experience project combines multisensory design and interactive interpretation to present Highland narratives.

title: Uist Unearthed (UHI NWH)
description: Location-aware archaeology project with AR interpretation in Uist.
longDescription: A UHI North, West and Hebrides project combining geolocation and AR storytelling to surface archaeological sites and narratives.
